aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description:
I am passionate about programming and electronics 💡

Currently, I work as a Full Stack Developer, specializing in Django and Vue 🐍

Outside of work, I repair electronics and design simple electronic circuits ⚡
I also design 3D models, print them, and use them in my workshop 🛠️

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Feel free to reach out if you want to collaborate on a project, have a question, or just want to connect 🤝
